title: [Question] ML/SE/DBMS ISA & ESA prep
content: How hard is it to score in ML, SE, and DBMS for ISA and ESA, and how to prepare for them? please help

comments.body:
ML can be a little tricky, read from slides, some YouTube videos if it’s confusing etc. overall it’s manageable, but may not be the highest scoring.
SE is just memorising, if you have bad memory start early lol. The questions in the ISA are pretty straightforward.
DBMS is by far the easiest, slides are your bible. 
If you have a good teacher(Mahitha,Nagasundari) listen in class, that’s half your prep done.
